name: summer-ge-at-cuesta
description: Advice on taking GE classes at Cuesta College over the summer.

events.content: Worth taking GE Area D at Cuesta over summer to lighten fall? Any paperwork?
Do it. Just double-check ASSIST so it maps to the right Area D course number.
After you finish, send the official transcript directly to Cal Poly Admissions. Takes ~2 weeks to post.
